title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Blended Information Literacy Capability Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy (able to use smartphones proficiently)
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can select materials by applying evaluation criteria for three or more reliable online information sources.
Learners can understand CC license types and utilize at least two OER materials suitable for their tasks.
Learners complete microlearning modules on a smartphone-based LMS with over 80% accuracy and submit feedback-incorporated projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
